Summary: it was triangle in shape with 3 lights one at the top and one on each side like a pyrimid
divs: Sighting Detailsi was in a car wreck and had been in the hospital for seven days i had three compression fractures in my back needless to say i had been on alot of pain killers but i had gotton out that day and was sent home to heal so my ex wife took me home (we were married then ) me and my wife were in the bed sleeping when i just woke up there was a bed room window across from me and i looked and seen these three lights they were very big they wern't collision lights these were like event lights huge and they were directly over my brothers house just hovering silently no niose what so ever so i thought i was dreaming so i woke my wife up and asked her am i dreaming or do you see these lights to and she said she saw them too so i kinda was numb from the pain killers and i remeber just looking at these lights for as long as possible the next thing we knew was we were waking up in the morning and the first thing i asked her was did that really happen or was it a dream and she said it happened and did not remember falling back to sleep either ,the next day it was all over the news and i asked my brother if he knew anything he said his house was vibrating but he thought he was dreaming he lives 600 to 900 yards from me i seen my ex a while back and asked her if she still remembered what happened she does, it was the most amazing thing i've ever saw in my entire life i just wonder what happened after they put us to sleep , added note , my right arm was paralyzed from the wreck and the doctor said it was permenant and would never return three months later i could move it and has returned 100% kinda makes me wonder if they did something to me the reason i am writing this is because i just saw the fourth kind and when that ship went over her house i got goose bumps and felt like that may have happened to me but i dont want to know if it did ,let me rephrase that don't know if anyone could find out if it did , but since your keeping a record i felt i needed to tell you , i am 46 years old now and to this day that memory stands out in my mind like it happened yesterday ,
trends: There have been no other sightings in Brooks
This sighting has never been favorited.
